body_html:
Thanks it seems that tensrflow is not utilizing the GPU, did you guys had to do anything specifically to run the example on the GPU ?
I have CUDA and CuDNN installed, and I have tried the command tf.device("gpu") before and it was working and the test went through!
Any advice ?
